page.title: 01GAZETTEER - GULVAL MARAZION
page.content:
The area is a very varied one. It includes part of the small village of{Gulval}and part of the larger village of{Marazion}with its seaside atmosphere. Between the two is the residential area of{Long Rock.} {Marazion Marsh}is a small wetland area important for bird life.
The south facing slopes overlooking {Mount's Bay}are well known for their fertile soil and sheltered aspect and have been farmed at least since the Iron Age. A small vineyard has been started recently.
The sandy beach which runs from {Eastern Green}to Marazion attracts holiday makers, and there are chalets and a large caravan and camping site. There is a small industrial site and a heliport alongside the A30 trunk road.
